allowed_issuers: Users allowed to grant the badge
no_rule: No rules have been defined yet.
enable_manual_issuing: Enable assignation by users who have obtained the badge
enable_auto_issuing_help: The badge is automatically granted when a user meet the defined criteria.
enable_auto_issuing_help_manual: The badge can still be granted manually even if the criteria are not met.
evidence_narrative_resource_status: The resource has obtained the status the %date%
evidence_narrative_workspace_status: The workspace has obtained the status the %date%
badge_disabled_help: This badge is disabled and cannot be granted.
hide_recipients: Hide the list of badge recipients
score_above_help: This value represents the percentage of the total score to be obtained.
addBadge: The badge badgeName has been added to the user userName
removeBadge: The badge badgeName has been removed to the user userName
notify_grant: Notify users when the badge is granted
